name: OVERSTRESSED
description:
“Welcome to OVERSTRESSED, where you are a service robot helping cyborg-humans combat their massive levels of stress by balancing the stress levels of your human’s Psyche Server to help them get their work done!”

In OVERSTRESSED, human civilization has merged with technology and transformed themselves into human-cyborgs but all that extra efficiency has led to tremendous increases in stress. Your job now is to be a Stress Relief Robot and to enter the Psyche Server of your human to help them combat stress. Dodge the red stress bullets shot by the red “Brain Nodes On Strike” and collect Green Cubes of Calm to soothe your human. Collecting Green Cubes enables your human to get work done and to relieve some stress accumulated by getting hit by the red stress bullets. The higher the stress level, the more powerful the stress bullets get, so watch out because they’ll knock you out and then it’s game over!
